Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium. Yellow-beige clay, core light orange, fairly dense clay. Graffito on inside of rim: ]ων[.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 76)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 646, no. 37)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 11)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.10)
